userreviews.userReview: I got this book for my five year old grandson. When it arrived I was impressed by the pictures and the content, but knew the true test was how much my grandson liked it. Well, he loves it. It's so wonderful to have a Bible story book that he looks forward to reading. In fact, he picks up the book on his own and pages through it when he comes over. What more could you ask for?

it took us awhile to read but we finished. my. 3 kids and I enjoyed reading this book. loved all the facts and different questions. it let us have some different discussions. I would recommend this book to others.

description: 2015 ECPA Christian Book Award Winner!Best-selling children's author Dandi Daley Mackall creates yet another fun and spiritually rich book for kids about God's animals. If you're looking for a new way to present some of the best-loved Bible stories, this book will help. Each of the Bible stories highlights an animal in the story while pointing to the deep spiritual truth. Then, a special page is devoted to zany facts about animals. The colorful and whimsical art adds even more interest. Each story also includes a powerful life application message, a prayer, and a Bible verse. Kids will love all the information on animals while they learn about God and the faith-filled accounts in the Bible.
title: My Bible Animals Storybook
